instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2850: What is 820-2850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT: What is PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT? PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT is a power rail that powers the LED light in the screen of the device that allows you to see what is on the screen. When this is low or missing, the screen will be dim..
definitions.C9560: What is C9560? Tantalum capacitor on 820-2850 logic board that often dies and causes intermittent power to framebuffer PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS and PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS_R rail, causing GPU kernel panics. Replace with non-tantalum if machine is having random black screen or kernel panics.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chimes but no image on lcd or external monitor
threads.message:
hey guys ,
                      received this board dead as it was liquid damaged, managed to bring it back to life  but no display is there .
1. there is no image ( no <SIGNAL>PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT</SIGNAL>)
2. w/ screen
PIN 4 = 3.2v
PIN 6 = 3.2v
PIN 7 = 3.2v
3. <TRANSISTOR>Q9807</TRANSISTOR> no voltage on pin 5
4. 1.57 volts on <CAPACITOR>C9560</CAPACITOR>

i have done mux reflow 

done graphics reflow


machine is working as i can hear the system working in back ground ( meaning when you press enter on login it makes that ding sound)
no display on external 


Out of ideas now ........ kindly advise

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chimes but no image on lcd or external monitor
threads.message: You have reflowed without even checking if there was external video? :(

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chimes but no image on lcd or external monitor
threads.message:
hi duke ,

i checked the external , internal , everything . after all that then went and did reflow ( only with hot air and flux for abt 30 -40 secs)
Before and after same result ( the system is working without display)

Also i have mentioned above no display on lcd or external :D:D:D
